thread.section_title: Eclipse Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eclipse Travel | www.eclipsetravel.com.au
thread.title: Natty McKernan
thread.title_full: Eclipse Travel reviewed by Natty McKernan

author: Natty McKernan
title: Natty McKernan
text: We were looked after by Matt at Eclipse Travel who was extremely helpful, intuitive and not pushy at all. From our enquiry all the way to our actual travel in Mexico, Matt and the team at Eclipse Travel made sure our experience was one that would be unforgettable. It was an amazing experience, hassle free and value for money. My husband and I would highly recommend Eclipse Travel to anyone, for an amazing travel experience.
